DataSource.Query: SELECT checkouts.value_date, checkouts.book_date, sales.invoice_number, customers.customer_name, items.item_name, checkout_details.quantity, units.unit_code, checkout_details.price, checkout_details.discount, ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) - inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS sub_total, ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) + inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS total FROM sales.sales JOIN inventory.checkouts ON sales.checkout_id = checkouts.checkout_id JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkouts.checkout_id = checkout_details.checkout_id JOIN inventory.items ON checkout_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON checkout_details.unit_id = units.unit_id JOIN finance.transaction_master ON sales.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id LEFT JOIN inventory.customers ON sales.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND checkouts.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND checkouts.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@ItemId, 0) = 0 OR items.item_id = @ItemId) AND (COALESCE(@CustomerId, 0) = 0 OR sales.customer_id = @CustomerId) AND (COALESCE(@BrandId, 0) = 0 OR items.brand_id = @BrandId);
